== Video Overview ==

New users that want to try the Live CD and/or install Ubuntu will need to first burn the CD image to a CD. This screencast demostrates how this can be accomplished using Nero, a popular CD/DVD burning application for Windows.

== Target Audience ==

* Users who are new to Ubuntu.

== Pre-requisites ==

* None.

== Required Knowledge ==

* Basic familiarity with Windows.

== Recommended Knowledge ==

* None.

== Objectives ==

* Show users how to create an Ubuntu Live/Install CD using Nero, a popular CD/DVD burning application for Windows.
